author: wlg2010

review: This thing is awesome.  Super easy to set up and so useful.  I don't know why anyone would by a roku or whatever else people stream with.  It actually doesn't drain your phone's battery or ram while you're streaming, once you start it somehow streams directly to the chromecast but you can pause it with your phone.  I figured this out because I restarted my phone in the middle of streaming a movie on HBOGO and the movie never stopped playing.

author: john is retiring

review: The primary reason for taking a chance on Chromecast was in the hope that it would provide the option for captions when watching Netflix. I have a Sony Bravia smart TV and for some reason it is not able to get Netflix captions. I was having to connect with an HDMI cable and use my laptop. The other problem is that Netflix is very slow to connect on my Bravia (certain times of day it would not connect at all), whereas there were no connection issues with my laptop. That's all over since I got Chromecast! Always quick Netflix connections plus captions. I'm controlling it with a Samsung S2 phone. Very easy to use. Love it! Saved me from buying a new TV.UPDATE: the dongle burned out after 3 months. In the hope that it was a fluke I replaced it with a new one.
